channel.title: Need beginner tut's for 508 !@!
channel.description:
I NEED HELP WITH MY 508 CLIENT :| I GOT A FEW QUESTIONS.. MAYBE YOU GUYS CAN HELP ME OUT HERE THEY ARE:
HOW I MAKE ::GIVEADMIN , DEMOTE , IPBAN , BAN AND KILL ETC COMMAND? HOW I MAKE A GOOD GODWARS WITH AGRESSIVE MONSTERS? HOW I ADD NEW MONSTERS? HOW I INCREASE THE STATUS OF AN ITEM? HOW I MAKE THAT LUNAR SPELLS WORKS 100%? HOW I ADD USING BARRAGE WITHOUT STAFF? HOW I CHANGE THE PLACE OF HOME? HOW I CHANGE THE NAMES IN QUEST TAB? HOW I CHANGE THE LOGIN TEXT? LIKE WELKOM ON ... THE OWNER IS ONLINE ! VOTE EVERDAY ON MOPAR ETC ! ETC.. THATS THE TUT'S I NEED THX FOR EVERONE THAT HELPS.. ;) :P :D :) ;)
